plot: Aine Yūki is good at making friends, and is enrolled in Star Harmony Academy's general education track. She befriends Mio Minato, the school's top idol, and becomes an idol herself.
opening_theme: "Arigato⇄Daijōbu" by Aine & Mio from BEST FRIENDS!
"Soko ni Shikanai Mono" by Aine, Mio, Ema, & Maika from BEST FRIENDS!
ending_theme: "Believe it" by Karen & Mirai from BEST FRIENDS!
"Pride" by Karen & Mirai from BEST FRIENDS!
